name: armor-of-poison-resistance-xdmg
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, no firearms unless specified, consistent painterly collection style, Detailed artifact: armor-of-poison-resistance-xdmg, pearl, coral, cloud-crystal, pressure-forged metals, abstract sigils (not letters), gentle glow, hand or ruler for size, product render, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Runes should be abstract sigils, not letter-like gibberish. Avoid readable words on the item., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Artifact armor-of-poison-resistance-xdmg with materials, runes, and scale.
revised_prompt: Generate a collection of painterly styled images that are evocative of high fantasy and medieval times. The focus should be on a detailed artifact, specifically armor-of-poison-resistance. The material choices should veer towards pressure-forged metals, pearl, coral, and cloud-crystal, with abstract sigils that emit a gentle glow instead of recognizable letters. Add a human hand or a ruler for scale. The armor should radiate an aquatic fantasy realism, with signs of subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. The color palette leans towards hues of deep teals, blues, sea-greens, with tasteful pearl highlights. Ensure that while detail is paramount, the image avoids the pitfalls of sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photorealism, anime styles, and bloom glare.
